named-query.name: account.testScalarQuery
named-query.query: select a.id as id, a.name as name, a.status as status, a.dateCreated as dateCreated, a.dateModified as dateModified from Account a order by name

named-query.name: account.testExecuteQuery
named-query.query: update Account set status = :status, billingModel = :billingModel where id = :id
